name: Elon's Hedgehog
description: Shrub (SHRUB) is a community-driven memecoin on the Ethereum network that celebrates the playful, unpredictable, and deeply viral nature of internet culture. Inspired by the way small, quirky ideas often capture global attention, SHRUB represents resilience, humor, and collective creativity. Like a real shrub, the token embodies steady growth, endurance through volatility, and the charm of something ordinary becoming extraordinary when fueled by community passion. It’s more than a token—it’s a symbol of how memes become movements.
